2.2.6.name: wordpress/wp-seo-tags
2.2.6.description:
This Plugin logs incoming queries from searchengines like Bing, Google and Yahoo. The last requests can be displayed via a sidebar widget. All keywords must be moderated before they appear in the widget. The Plugin will serve dynamicly a Tag-Search-Page for each Keyword Phrase wich is linked with the appropriate entry in the widget. This page will list all related posts regarding to the submited keywords. So far a complete translation is available in English, German, French, Russian and Arab.

A sample page search can be found at http://saquery.com/tags/javascript-execution-context.
